nodes.text: Jado Starstrider was a male Nothoiin. By the time of the Iron Blockade, he and his twin sister Zenia were part of the Data Seekers society, whose members had rescued them from a fire on their homeworld of Nothoiin.
In the 2015 iOS video game Star Wars: Uprising, Jado Starstrider is one of the many crew members that can be sent on Crew Runs for helpful items.
